records.title: Golden Hour Part 1
records.blurb: “Golden Hour: Part.1 is the tenth extended play by South Korean boy band Ateez. It was released on May 31, 2024, through KQ Entertainment, RCA Records, and Legacy Recordings. It consists of six tracks, including the title track "Work". The EP also serves as the beginning of the Golden Hour series.” – Wikipedia

records.title: Golden Hour Part 2
records.blurb: “Golden Hour: Part.2 is the eleventh extended play by South Korean boy band Ateez. It was released on November 15, 2024, through KQ Entertainment, RCA Records, and Legacy Recordings. It consists of six tracks, including the title track "Ice on My Teeth".” – Wikipedia

records.title: The World EP.Fin Will [X Ver.]
records.blurb: “The World EP.Fin: Will is the second Korean-language and fourth overall studio album by South Korean boy band Ateez, released on December 1, 2023, through KQ Entertainment, RCA Records and Legacy Recordings. It is the final installment in the group's The World series, following six months after The World EP.2: Outlaw.” – Wikipedia

records.title: Indigo
records.blurb: “Indigo is the debut studio album by South Korean rapper RM of BTS, released on December 2, 2022, through Big Hit Music. The album marks the rapper's first full-length body of work since Mono and serves as a documentation or archive of his late twenties.” – Wikipedia. Ayesha and I listened to this vinyl for the first time together, and I actually became an unexpected fan. The opening track has remarkably chill vibes. I also like “Still Life,” and “Wild Flower.”
